title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data in a table that is inside a grid cell
OB: Exception is thrown when attempting to export data in two tables that are inside grid cells.
EB: When exporting data from two tables inside grid cells, the expected result is that the data is exported successfully. However, the actual result is that an exception occurs in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() method.
SR:
To reproduce this bug:
1. Insert one table into a grid cell.
2. Insert another table into the other grid cell.
3. Attempt to export the data from both tables.
